Sentencas: Chromium poisoning is one of the primary factors that affect solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) durability.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: In this study, an electrochemical cleaning method has been employed to reverse the effects of chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Two cells were fabricated and poisoned under identical conditions by operating them at 800 degrees C in the presence of a Cr source.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Both poisoned cells exhibited a significant reduction in maximum power density and an increase in polarization resistance.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: One of the poisoned cells, designated as the baseline cell, was cooled to room temperature after poisoning.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Microstructural observation of the baseline cell showed significant contamination of the cathode active layer by chromium oxide and (Cr,Mn) spinel deposits.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The other poisoned cell was electrochemically cleaned for 2 h under a mild electrolytic condition.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: As a result of the electrochemical cleaning process, the chromium oxide deposits were substantially removed leading to a significant reduction of Cr concentration in the cathode, especially at the cathode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: A substantial fraction of the cell performance loss was also reversed.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: To the best of our knowledge, this is a first demonstration of reversing the effects of chromium poisoning using a rapid in-situ process.
Titulo: Electrochemical cleaning: An in-Situ method to reverse chromium poisoning in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
